task_definition_name: Mifos Mobile App: Do the translation of the app in Polish language
description:
## Summary

You have to do a translation of our Mifos Mobile App into the Polish Language. We don't have Polish language file, create one and add translations in that. Add it to the Settings also, so that user can view it.

This would enable the localization feature app which is very much awaited feature in the community.
